name: Kabul
alternateNames: Kabul.  (Char Dehi, a separate district in 325 district set, was absorbed into the Kabul district in the 1990's.)

name: Dih Sabz
alternateNames: DehSabz, Deh-e Sabz, Deh Sabz, Dih Sabz.

name: Qarabagh
alternateNames: Qara Bagh, Qarabagh, Qarah Bagh.  (There is also a Qara Bagh district of Kabul.)

name: Chahar Asyab
alternateNames: Chahar Asyab, Chaharasyab, Char Asyab, Char Asiab.

name: Bagrami
alternateNames: Bagrami.  (There is also a Bagram in Parwan. The airfield is in Baghram of Parwan, not Baghrami.)

name: Khaki Jabbar
alternateNames: Khak-e-Jabar, Khak-i-Jabar, Khak Jabar, Khaki Jabbar.

name: Guldara
alternateNames: Guldara, Gul Dara, Gul Darah, Guldra.

name: Hisa-i-Awali Kohistan
alternateNames: Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan, Hisah-e Awal-e Kohistan, Kohistan Awal, Kohistani Awal.  (There is also a Hissa-e-Duwumi Kohistan in Kapisa, a Kohistan in Badakhshan, another Kohistan in Faryab, and Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Hisa-i-Duwumi Kohistan
alternateNames: Hissa-e-Duwumi Kohistan, Hisah-e Dowum-e Kohistan, Kohistan-I-Duwum.  (There is also a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Kohistan in Badakhshan, another Kohistan in Faryab, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Jabalussaraj
alternateNames: Jabulussaraj, Jabal Saraj, Jablas Saraj, Jabal us Saraj.

name: Shinwari
alternateNames: Shinwar, Ghanikhel, Ghani Kahil.  (There is also a Ghani Khel (aka  Qarghayee) district in Laghman.)

name: Shekh  Ali
alternateNames: Shaykh Ali, Sheikh Ali, Shekhali, Shaykh 'Ali.

name: Surkhi Parsa
alternateNames: Surkh Parsa, Surkhi Parsa, Surkh-e-Parsa, Surkhe Parsa, Surkh-o Parsa, Lolinge, Lowlenge.

name: Bagram
alternateNames: Bagrami.  (There is also a Bagram in Parwan. The airfield is in Baghram of Parwan, not Baghrami.)

name: Sayd Khel
alternateNames: Sayyid Khel, Saydkhel. There is also a Sayyad district in Sar-e-Pul, a Sayyid Karam in Paktia, and a Sayyid Abad district in Wardak.

name: Markazi Bihsud
alternateNames: Markaz-e-Behsud, Markaz-i-Bihsud.  (There is also a Hisa-e-Awal-e-Behsud district in Wardak, and a Behsud district in Nangarhar.)

name: Jaghatu
alternateNames: Jaghatu, Jaghato, Jighatu, Bahrami Shahid, Bahram-e Shahid, Waeez Shahid, Wais Shahid.  (There is also a Jaghatu in Wardak province.)

name: Charkh
alternateNames: Char Kent, Charkent, Charkint, Chahar Kent, Char Kant.

name: Surkh Rod
alternateNames: Surkh Rud, Surkhrud, Surkh Rod, Surkhrod, Sorkh Roud.

name: Shirzad
alternateNames: Sher Zad, Sherzad, Shir Zad, Shirzad.

name: Khogyani
alternateNames: Khugyani, Khogiani, Khoghiani, Wali Muhammad Shahid, Wali Muhammad-e-Shahid .  (There is also a Khugyani in Nangarhar.)

name: Achin
alternateNames: Achin, Achen, Acheen, Achine.  (Spingar is part of Achin in the 399 and 407 sets.)

name: Shinwar
alternateNames: Shinwar, Ghanikhel, Ghani Kahil.  (There is also a Ghani Khel (aka  Qarghayee) district in Laghman.)

name: Lal Por
alternateNames: Lalpoor, Lalpur, La'lpur, Lalpor, Lal Pur.

name: Qarghayi
alternateNames: Qarghayee, Ghani Khel, Qarghayi, Qarghah'i, Ghanikhel, Ghanikhil.  (There is also a Ghani Khel (aka Shinwar) district in Nangarhar.)

name: Dawlatshah
alternateNames: Dawlat Shah, Dawlatshah.  (There is also a Dawlatyar in Ghor, a Dawlatabad in Balkh, and another Dawlat Abad in Faryab.)

name: Bazarak
alternateNames: Baharak, Bahorak.  (There is also a Baharak district in Takhar.)

name: Dahana-I- Ghuri
alternateNames: Dahana-e-Ghuri, Dahanah-ye Ghori, Dahana-e-Ghori, Dand-e Ghor.

name: Tala Wa Barfak
alternateNames: Tala Wa Barfak, Talah wa Barfak, Tala Barfak.

name: Khost Wa Firing
alternateNames: Khost Wa Firing, Khost Wa Fereng, Khost Ferent, Khost.  (Khost Wa Firing is not the same as Firing Wa Gharu of Baghlan.)

name: Farang Wa Gharu
alternateNames: Firing Wa Gharu, Fereng Wa Gharu, Farang wa Gharu, Farang.

name: Khwaja Hijran (Jilga Nahrin)
alternateNames: Khwaja Hejran, Jalga, Khwajahejran, Khwajah Higran.

name: Yakawlang
alternateNames: Yakawlang, Yakawlang No. 1, Yakawlang Hesa-i Awal, Yakawland Hise Awal.  (The 399 and 407 sets show Yakawlang No. 2 as part of Yakawlang.)

name: Khwaja Umari
alternateNames: Khwaja Omari, Khwajah Omari, Khwajaumari, Khwaja Umari.

name: Muqur
alternateNames: Muqur, Moqur, Moqor.  (There is also a Moqur district in Ghazni.)

name: Qarabagh
alternateNames: Qara Bagh, Qarabagh, Qarah Bagh.  (There is also a Qara Bagh district of Kabul.)

name: Zurmat
alternateNames: Zurmat, Zormat.  (Rohany Baba is part of Zurmat in the 399, 407 and 419 sets.)

name: Jani Khail
alternateNames: Jani Khel, Janikhel.  (There is also a Jani Khel in Paktika.)

name: Dand Patan
alternateNames: Dand Patan, Dand wa Patan, Dand-e Patan.  (There is also a Dand district in Kandahar.)

name: Chamkani
alternateNames: Samkani, Chamkani, Chamkani, Tchamkani, Tsamkani, Samkani, Samkanai.

name: Laja Ahmad Khail
alternateNames: Laja Ahmad Khel, Ahmadkhel, Ahmad Khel.  (The Laja Mangel area is included in Laja Ahmad Khel in the 399 set.)

name: Sayed Karam
alternateNames: There is also a Sayyad district in Sar-e-Pul, a Sayyid Khel in Parwan, and a Sayyid Abad district in Wardak.  (Mirzaka is part of Sayyid Karam in the 399 set, and split off in the others.)

name: Bar Kunar
alternateNames: Bar Kunar, Bar Konar, Barkunar, Asmar.

name: Dara-I-Pech
alternateNames: Dara-e-Pech, Dara-I-Pech, Darah-ye Pech, Pech Dara, Mano Gai, Manogai, Manogay.

name: Waygal
alternateNames: Waygal, Want Wagal, Wegal, Want Wegal.

name: Bargi Matal
alternateNames: Bargi Matal, Barg-i-Matal, Barg-e-Matal, Barg-e-Mataal, Bargromatal.

name: Fayzabad
alternateNames: Faiz Abad, Fayzabad.  (There is also a Faizabad district in Jowzjan.)

name: Kuran Wa Munjan
alternateNames: Kiran Wa Menjan, Kirn wa Manjan, Koran o Monjan.

name: Ishkashiem
alternateNames: Eshkashim, Ishkashem.  (Eshkashim is sometimes confused with Eshkamish district of Takhar.)

name: Baharak
alternateNames: Baharak, Bahorak.  (There is also a Baharak district in Takhar.)

name: Raghistan
alternateNames: Kohistan, Kohestiani.  (There is also a Kohistan in Faryab, a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Hissa-e Duome Kohistan in Kapisa, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Shahri Buzurg
alternateNames: Shahri Buzurg, Shahr-e-Buzorg, Shahr-e Buzurg, Shar-e-Buzurg.

name: Darwazbala
alternateNames: Darwaz-e-Bala, Upper Darwaz, Mamai, Mam May.  (Several sources mistakenly reverse Mamai, the center of Darwaz-e-Bala, with Nesay, the center of Darwaz-e-Payin.)

name: Kohistan
alternateNames: Kohistan, Kohestiani.  (There is also a Kohistan in Faryab, a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Hissa-e Duome Kohistan in Kapisa, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Yaftal Sufla
alternateNames: Yaftal-e-Sufla, Yaftal Payin, Yaftal-i-Paen, Lower Yaftal.

name: Ishkamish
alternateNames: Eshkamesh, Ishkamish.  (There is also an Eshkashim district in Badakhshan.)

name: Chah Ab
alternateNames: Chahar Asyab, Chaharasyab, Char Asyab, Char Asiab.

name: Khwaja Ghar
alternateNames: Khwaja Omari, Khwajah Omari, Khwajaumari, Khwaja Umari.

name: Baharak
alternateNames: Baharak, Bahorak.  (There is also a Baharak district in Takhar.)

name: Dashti Qala
alternateNames: Dashti Qala, Dasht-i-Qala, Dasht-e-Qala,, Dasht-e Qal'ah.

name: Kunduz
alternateNames: Kunduz, Konduz.  (Gurtepa is part of the Kunduz capital district in the 399 and 407 sets.)

name: Imam Sahib
alternateNames: Imam Sahib, Hazrati Imam Sahib, Emamsaheb, Emam Sahib.

name: Dashte Archi
alternateNames: Dasht-e-Archi, Dasht-i-Archi.  (Calbad is part of Dasht-e-Archi in the 399 and 407 sets.)

name: Dara-I-Sufi Payin
alternateNames: Dara-e-Soof-i-Payin, Darah-ye-Suf-e Pa'in, Dara-e-Sof-e-Payin, Dara-e-Souf-e-Payan, Dara-i-Sauf Paeen.

name: Khuram Wa Sarbagh
alternateNames: Khuram Wa Sarbagh,Khuram wa Sar Bagh, Khuram Sarbagh.

name: Kohistanat
alternateNames: Kohistan, Kohestiani.  (There is also a Kohistan in Faryab, a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Hissa-e Duome Kohistan in Kapisa, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Sayyad
alternateNames: Sayyad, Sayad.  (There is also a Sayyid Khel district in Parwan, a Sayyid Karam in Paktika, and a Sayyid Abad district in Wardak.)

name: Chaghcharan
alternateNames: Khani Charbagh, Khan-e-Char Bagh. Khan-e Chahr Bagh, Khan Chahr Bagh.

name: Shahrak
alternateNames: Baharak, Bahorak.  (There is also a Baharak district in Takhar.)

name: Lal Wa Sarjangal
alternateNames: Lal Wa SarJangal, La'l wa SarJangal.

name: Dawlat Yar
alternateNames: Dawlatyar, Dolatyar, Dawlat Yar.  (There is also a Dawlatshar in Laghman, a Dawlat Abad in Faryab, and a Dawlatabad in Balkh.)

name: Gizab
alternateNames: Gizab, Gezab.  (Patoo is part of Gizab district, and it is part of Daikundi in the 399 and 407 sets.  Gizab (minus Patoo) is part of Urugzan province in the 419 and 421 sets.)

name: Sangi Takht
alternateNames: Sang-e-Takht, Sangi Takht, Sang-e-Takht Bandar, Bandar.

name: Tirin Kot
alternateNames: Tirinkot, Tirin Kot, Tarinkot, Tarin Kot.

name: Shahidi Hassas
alternateNames: Shahidi Hassas, Shaidi Assas, Charchino, Char China.  (Sia Sang is included in Shahidi Hassas in all district sets, but some consider it to be a district.)

name: Tarnak Wa Jaldak
alternateNames: Tarnak wa Jaldak, Jeldak, Jaldak, Shahr-e-Safa, Shar-e-Safa.

name: Shinkay
alternateNames: Shinkai, Shinkay.  (There is also a Shinkai area in Kapisa.  The Surri (or Seuri, Sewray) area is included in Shinkai in all of these district sets.)

name: Naw Bahar
alternateNames: Baharak, Bahorak.  (There is also a Baharak district in Takhar.)

name: Zarghun Shahr
alternateNames: Zarghun Shahr, Khair Kot, Katawaz, Zarghunshahr.

name: Dila
alternateNames: Dilaram, Delaram.  (Dilaram is part of Kashrod in the 399 district set.)

name: Waza Khwa
alternateNames: Wazakhwah, Waza Khwa, Wazah Khwah, Wazi Khwa.

name: Wor Mayi
alternateNames: Wormamay, Wur Mamay, Wormamai, Wormami, Wor Mamay.

name: Gomal
alternateNames: Gomal, Gumal.  (Chaharbaran is part of Gomal in these district sets, but is often refered to as a district.)

name: Sar Hawza
alternateNames: Sar Rawza, Sar Hawza, Sarrawzah, Sarhawzah, Sar Hawzeh.

name: Jani Khel
alternateNames: Jani Khel, Janikhel.  (There is also a Jani Khel in Paktika.)

name: Jaji Maidan
alternateNames: Jaji Maidan, Jajimaydan, Jaji, Zazi Maidan, Zazi, Zazai.

name: Mando Zayi
alternateNames: Manduzay, Esmayel Khil, Mandozayi, Manduzai, Ismail Khel, Mando Zayi.

name: Dawlatabad
alternateNames: Dawlat Abad, Dawlatabad, Dolatabad.  (There is also a Dawlatabad in Faryab, and a Dawlatshah in Laghman, and a Dawlatyar in Ghor.)

name: Chahar Kint
alternateNames: Char Kent, Charkent, Charkint, Chahar Kent, Char Kant.

name: Kaldar
alternateNames: Kaldar.  (The 421 district set shows Sharak-e-Hairatan as part of Kaldar.)

name: Khwaja Du Koh
alternateNames: Khwajadukoh, Khwaja Dukoh, Khwajah Do Koh, Kohja Dukoh.

name: Fayzabad
alternateNames: Faiz Abad, Fayzabad.  (There is also a Faizabad district in Jowzjan.)

name: Kohistan
alternateNames: Kohistan, Kohestiani.  (There is also a Kohistan in Faryab, a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Hissa-e Duome Kohistan in Kapisa, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Shirin Tagab
alternateNames: Shirin Tagab, Shirintagab, Sherin Tagab, Sherin Tagau.  (There is also a Tagab in Kapisa and in Badakhshan.)

name: Dawlatabad
alternateNames: Dawlat Abad, Dawlatabad, Dolatabad.  (There is also a Dawlatabad in Faryab, and a Dawlatshah in Laghman, and a Dawlatyar in Ghor.)

name: Khani Chahar Bagh
alternateNames: Khani Charbagh, Khan-e-Char Bagh. Khan-e Chahr Bagh, Khan Chahr Bagh.

name: Nad Ali
alternateNames: Nad Ali, Nad-e-Ali, Nad 'Ali, Nadali. (Marja is part of Nad Ali in the 399 district set.)

name: Nawa-I- Barak Zayi
alternateNames: Nawa-i-Barikzayi, Nawa-e-Barakzaiy, Nawah-ye-Barakzai, Nawa, Shamalan.  (There is also a Nawa district in Ghazni.)

name: Reg(Khanshin)
alternateNames: Reg, Registan.  (There is also a Reg-e Khan Neshin, in Kandahar, and a Ragistan in Badakhshan.)

name: Shah Wali Kot
alternateNames: Shah Wali Kot, Shahwalikot, Shah Walikot..

name: Spin Boldak
alternateNames: Spin Boldak, Spinboldak.  (Takhta Pul is part of Spin Boldak in the 399 an 407 sets.)

name: Arghistan
alternateNames: Kohistan, Kohestiani.  (There is also a Kohistan in Faryab, a Hissa-e-Awali Kohistan in Kapisa, a Hissa-e Duome Kohistan in Kapisa, and a Kohistanat in Saripul.)

name: Qadis
alternateNames: Qadis.  (Some consider Dara-e Bom to be a district.  It is included in Qadis here.)

name: Ghormach
alternateNames: Ghormach, Ghormuch.  (All of the district sets presented here list Ghormach in Badghis.  The IDLG, along with many news sources, report it as part of Faryab.)

name: Muqur
alternateNames: Muqur, Moqur, Moqor.  (There is also a Moqur district in Ghazni.)

name: Shindand
alternateNames: Shindand, Sabzwar. Shindand, Esfezar (Shindand's five buluk subdivisions were split into five districts in the 419 and 421 set.  One of them still named Shindand.)

name: Pusht Rod
alternateNames: Pushtrud, Pushtrod, Pusht-e Rod, Pusht Road, Poshtrud.

name: Dilaram
alternateNames: Dilaram, Delaram.  (Dilaram is part of Kashrod in the 399 district set.)
